entry.def: Half-yearly means happening in the middle of a calendar year or a financial year.

example.ex: This is the half-yearly meeting of the interim committee.
example.tran: 这是临时委员会召开的年中例会。

example.ex: ...the Central Bank's half-yearly report on the state of the economy.
example.tran: 中央银行关于经济状况的年中报告

entry.def: A company's half-yearly profits are the profits that it makes in six months.

example.ex: The company announced a half-yearly profit of just £2 million.
example.tran: 该公司公布其半年利润仅为200万英镑。

entry.def: Half-yearly means happening twice a year, with six months between each event.

means.word_mean: 1. every half year, every six months
